featured.text: The booth he built 25 only an old dial phone with a disconnected phone line.
If the number 16 is in the same area as the number making the call, an area code usually doesn’t need to be dialed.
The local number, 17 , must always be dialed in its entirety.

definition.zh_def: 撥號盤；轉盤，通常用於調整或選擇設定。
definition.en_def: A circular device used for making a phone call or adjusting settings.
definition.example: She turned the dial to increase the volume.
